mutants.code:
def find_max_min_swap(arr):
    max_num = max(arr)
    min_num = min(arr)
    max_index = arr.index(max_num)
    min_index = arr.index(min_num)
    (arr[max_index], arr[min_index]) = (arr[min_index], arr[max_index])
    arr = list(set(arr))
    arr.sort(reverse=False)
    arr_sum = sum(arr)
    return (arr, arr_sum)
